item.title: 在乔-拜登的领导下，石油和天然气行业的利润增长了两倍，尽管该行业对他大加挞伐，并警告他的连任将给该行业带来 "灾难性 "影响 @mylesmccormick_ via @ft
item.description:
Oil and gas profits triple under Joe Biden even as industry decries him and warns a second term would be "disastrous" for the sector @mylesmccormick_ https://t.co/umaTZVhHEH via @ft

— Jamie Smyth (@JamieSmythF) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在乔-拜登总统的领导下，美国最大的石油和天然气生产商的利润几乎增长了两倍，尽管该行业斥责拜登政府的 "敌对 "政策
item.description:
Profits for the biggest US oil and gas producers have almost tripled under President Joe Biden, even as the industry berates his administration’s 'hostile' policies https://t.co/t5G36C9KuV pic.twitter.com/YMZVcfoDn6

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.title: 欧洲国内企业无法与来自中国的大量廉价进口产品竞争，而中国是全球太阳能发电的领头羊。布鲁塞尔面临压力，必须采取严格的关税措施进行干预
item.description:

item.title: 大流行前夕，英国的税收收入约占国民收入的 33%，到 2028-29 年将攀升至 37.7%，这是自第二次世界大战结束以来的最高水平。
item.description:
Tax revenues in the UK, which accounted for about 33% of national income on the eve of the pandemic, are set to climb to 37.7% by 2028-29 — the highest since the end of the second world war https://t.co/YmOtCrAbfa

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024

item.title: .@AmyKazmin 和 @giu_ric 谈意大利的亲莫斯科分子，包括一个 "在宣传维罗纳 1797 年反抗法国占领军的历史重演时 "被 "来自马里乌波尔的 "俄罗斯人找上门的人。
item.description:
.@AmyKazmin and @giu_ric on Italy’s pro-Moscow simpaticos, including one guy who got into it when he was approached by Russian-speakers “from Mariupol while promoting a historic re-enactment of Verona’s 1797 revolt against French occupying forces.”

https://t.co/a1AeJwNGh1

— max seddon (@maxseddon) February 27, 2024

item.title: 今天的《内部政治》：关于李-安德森（Lee Anderson）的 "这是错的--但不是以唯一可能错的方式错的 "舞蹈之谜，以及他如何以这种方式处理所有事情：
item.description:
Today’s Inside Politics: on the mystery of Rishi Sunak’s “it was wrong-but not wrong in the only way it can actually have been wrong” dance on Lee Anderson and how that approach is how he approaches everything: https://t.co/xd16xRG1gn

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) February 27, 2024
